name: The Scribbler

specials.name: Lamashtu's Healing
specials.description: At the beginning of each turn, as long as The Scribbler is in Lamashtu's Shrine, reduce the level of any negative condition (such as enfeebled, frightened, sickened, stupified) by 1.

specials.name: Lamashtu's Swiftness
specials.description: While within Lamashtu's Shrine, The Scribbler's speed becomes 60 feet, and he gains a +4 circumstance bonus to initative rolls.

specials.name: Blessed Life
specials.description: The Scribbler does not age or breathe, does not require food, drink or sleep.

specials.name: Divine Guardian
specials.description: The Scribbler casts _dimension_ _door_, but can only transport himself within the area of Lamashtu's Shrine.

specials.name: Copycat
specials.description:
The Scribbler casts Mirror Image, but only conjures one illusory image.  Any attack that would hit you has a random 1 of 2 (1-3 on a d6)chance of  insteadhitting the image, destroying it.
If an attack roll fails to hit The Scribbler's AC but doesnâ€™t critically fail, it destroys the image but has no additional effect (even if the attack would normally have an effect on a failure). If an attack roll is a critical success and would hit the images,then the image is destroyed and the attack roll becomes a success against The Scribbler. Once all the image isdestroyed, the spell ends.
